name: Join the Corps
description: Corpsmembers earn $18.50 per hour for the hours worked in the field (approximately 30 hours per week). Plus, Corpsmembers are required to attend 2 hours per week of unpaid school or work development workshops.
fullDescription: Corpsmembers earn $18.50 per hour for the hours worked in the field (approximately 30 hours per week). Plus, Corpsmembers are required to attend 2 hours per week of unpaid school or work development workshops.
whatTheyOffer: Corpsmembers earn $18.50 per hour for the hours worked in the field (approximately 30 hours per week). Plus, Corpsmembers are required to attend 2 hours per week of unpaid school or work development workshops.
